700802f-c.text:
(1)
Corsa Ave. (center), south from Boston Road to Burke Ave., its point of termination (distant background). On the right appear the rears of houses facing on Fenton Ave., and on the left are homes on
the east side of Eastchester Rd.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, another view. Corsa Ave. is on the right.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
Part of the same, as seen from Givan Ave. This cleared area is
on the west side of Corsa Ave.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
700802f-c.folder: Corsa Avenue & Boston Road, Bronx, NY
